title: Mien Hua Tien - Cotton Fields - BoAi Road
description: Part of organic food and grocery chain throughout greater Taipei and in nearby cities (see website for locations). This one is a moderate size store with a little bit of everything. This location has a deli and a lunch counter (choice of rice or noodle set). Prices are expensive but everything is organic and/or all natural. Many imported items. Chinese name 棉花田, address 台北市中正區博愛路47號(土地銀行斜對面).
